title: Looking for the \*exact\* font used for the GUESS Jeans logo (similar to Times)
content:
i need to know what this font is. it kind of looks like times new roman but the G is narrower and the serifs don't end at a point. please help, i need this for a research essay.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20141123033709im_/http:/typophile.com/files/guess_6262.JPG)

also, if anyone knows of any somewhat popular fashion companies/stores that use the Rockwell font in their logo that information would be greatly appriciated.
author: ida

comments.content: not all logos are derived directly from fonts. i'm sure you can find something similar to this, but i doubt you'll find an exact font match for this logotype.

I seriously doubt you'll find anything closer than Times. You can find the actual logo [here](http://web.archive.org/web/20141123033709/http:/brandsoftheworld.com/search/?query_id=4482351&page=1&mtype=&brand_id=16024).
thanks so much everyone i appriciate it
